channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Announcing General Availability of GitHub Copilot for Azure—Now with Agent Mode】宣布GitHub Copilot用于Azure的一般可用性 - 现在使用Agent Mode
item.description: 【Unlocking a New DevOps Era GitHub Copilot for Azure was first introduced at Ignite 2024 as a public preview, empowering developers, IT operators, and DevOps practitioners to leverage natural language to provision, configure, and manage r】首次在IGNITE 2024上引入了新的Devops ERA GITHUB COPILOT作为Azure的副驾驶，作为公共预览，增强开发人员，IT运营商和DevOps从业人员的能力，以利用自然语言来提供，配置和管理R

item.title: 【Deprecation of MS-APP-ACTS-AS header in Shifts Management Microsoft Graph APIs】换档管理中的MS-App-Acts-As标题Microsoft Graph API
item.description: 【In app-only access scenarios, Shifts Management Graph APIs previously required the MS-APP-ACTS-AS: userId header to indicate the user on whose behalf the application was acting. However, this conflicted with the】在仅应用程序访问方案中，移动管理图API先前需要MS-App-Acts-AS：用户ID标头来指示代表其代表应用程序代表的用户。但是，这与

item.title: 【💻 Spring Cleaning for Dev Boxes: Mastering Manual & Automatic Offboarding】💻开发盒的弹簧清洁：掌握手册和自动卸货
item.description: 【Let’s face it. Sometimes your Dev Box just… hangs around too long. Whether you’ve moved to a new project, left the company, want to create a new dev box with the latest tools, it's time to clean things up. 🎯 With Dev Box Auto-Deletion now in public preview, offboarding just got a whole lot easier. Here's everything】让我们面对现实吧。有时您的开发盒只是……闲逛太久了。无论您是搬到一个新项目，离开了公司，都想创建一个带有最新工具的新开发框，现在该清理东西了。 🎯现在在公共预览中使用开发框自动删除，卸货变得容易得多。这是一切

item.title: 【The MIDL compiler still has trouble with double greater-than signs, sadly】MIDL编译器仍然遇到双重迹象的麻烦，可悲的是
item.description: 【The parser for the Microsoft MIDL compiler has long suffered from the problem of the double greater-than sign. This problem plagued C++ until C++11 added a special rule:¹ [temp.names] (4): When parsing a template-argument-list, the first non-nested > is taken as the ending delimiter rath】Microsoft MIDL编译器的解析器长期以来遭受了双重大号的问题。这个问题困扰着C ++直到C ++ 11添加了一个特殊的规则：¹[temp.names]（4）：解析模板 - argument-list时，第一个非纽扣>被视为结束定界线rath

item.title: 【Inside Access: Join Us at VS Live! Redmond for a Week of Deep Developer Learning】内部访问：加入我们的VS Live！雷德蒙德（Redmond）进行一周的深度开发人员学习
item.description: 【A long time ago, I stood in a packed room at VS Live! and watched developers erupt in applause after a debugging demo shaved hours off a real-world problem. That was the moment I realized this wasn’t just a conference—it was a place where developers and toolmakers come together to push the craft forward. I’m excited to announce that I】很久以前，我站在VS Live的一个拥挤的房间里！在调试演示剃光的数小时后，看着开发人员在掌声中爆发了掌声。那是我意识到这不仅是一次会议，而且是开发人员和工具制造商聚在一起推动工艺前进的地方。我很高兴地宣布我

item.title: 【Balance governance and flexibility with Dev Box project policies】通过开发框项目政策的平衡治理和灵活性
item.description: 【As organizations scale their development efforts, managing access to cloud resources becomes critical. Platform engineers need to strike a balance between enforcing governance and enabling developer agility. At Build 2025, we announced the general availability of project policies in Microsoft Dev Box, which provides a powerful】随着组织扩大开发工作，管理对云资源的访问变得至关重要。平台工程师需要在执行治理和使开发人员敏捷性之间取得平衡。在2025年的Build 2025中，我们宣布了Microsoft Dev Box中项目政策的一般可用性，该项目提供了强大的

item.title: 【🎉 Now in Public Preview: Create Dev Boxes on Behalf of Your Developers】🎉现在在公共预览中：代表开发人员创建开发框
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce that one of our most-requested features is officially in Public Preview: You can now create Dev Boxes on behalf of your developers】我们很高兴地宣布，我们最要求的功能之一是正式的公开预览：您现在可以代表开发人员创建开发框

item.title: 【codex-mini: Fast, Scalable Code Generation for the CLI Era】Codex-Mini：CLI时代的快速，可扩展的代码生成
item.description: 【We’re announcing the general availability of Azure OpenAI’s codex-mini in Azure AI Foundry Models. codex-mini is a fine-tuned version of the o4-mini model, designed to deliver rapid, instruction-following performance for developers working in CLI workflows. Whether you'r】我们宣布Azure Openai在Azure AI Foundry模型中的Codex-Mini的总体可用性。 Codex-Mini是O4-Mini型号的微调版本，旨在为在CLI工作流中工作的开发人员提供快速，指导性的性能。无论你是

item.title: 【The case of the invalid handle error when a handle is closed while a thread is waiting on it】当线程在等待时关闭手柄时，无效的手柄错误的情况
item.description: 【A customer tracked one of their crashes to an invalid handle exception being raised when one thread closed a handle that another thread was waiting for. Or at least that's how they presented the problem. The stack trace in the crash dump said ntdll!KiRaiseUserExceptionDispatcher+0x3a KERNELBASE!WaitForMultipleObjectsEx+0x】当一个线程关闭另一个线程在等待的句柄时，客户将其中一次崩溃跟踪到无效的手柄异常。或至少这就是他们提出问题的方式。碰撞转储中的堆栈跟踪表示ntdll！kiraiseuserexceptiondispatcher+0x3a kernelbase！waitgurfformultipleObjectsex+0x

item.title: 【o-series Updates: New o3 pricing and o3-pro in Azure AI Foundry】O系列更新：Azure AI Foundry中的新O3定价和O3-Pro
item.description: 【o-series Updates: New o3 pricing and o3-pro in Azure AI Foundry We are excited to announce the availability of o3-pro, the newest model in the Azure AI Foundry via Azure OpenAI. o3-pro combines more compute with long context and multimodal input to deliver consistently better answers for complex tasks. o3-pro is available via the】O系列更新：Azure AI Foundry中的新O3定价和O3-Pro，我们很高兴宣布O3-Pro的可用性，O3-Pro是Azure AI铸造厂中通过Azure OpenAi中的最新型号的可用性。 O3-Pro将更多的计算与长上下文和多模式输入相结合，以为复杂的任务提供更好的答案。 O3-Pro可通过
